name: Auberge le Jardin d'Antoine

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.text: We recently stayed for three nights at l'Auberge Jardin d'Antoine.

reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful
reviews.text: Hotel is quiet (even though on a hopping street) and in a fantastic location in the Latin Quarter. It's close to St. Catherine and the Plateau as well. Standard rooms were clean and cute, if not fancy, and price, which included breakfast, was totally reasonable. Staff was very helpful with recommendations. We would definitely stay here again.

description: Location – Location - Location! You will feel at home in our cozy 25-room intimate hotel ideally located on the famous St. Denis Street in Downtown Montreal. We offer you comfortable rooms, a warm welcome and a free generous buffet breakfast since 1989.
